name: Apple 14" MacBook Pro (M4 Pro, Silver)
description: Supercharged with their M4 chip and Apple Intelligence, the silver Apple 14" MacBook Pro offers a tremendous performance boost for researchers, developers, engineers, creative pros, or anyone that needs even faster performance for more demanding workflows. The system features Apple's M4 Pro 14-Core Chip, which is combined with a 20-Core GPU, Dynamic Caching, and hardware-accelerated ray tracing, all of which significantly increase performance for the most demanding pro apps and games. Also featured is a 16-core Neural Engine with Apple Intelligence, a personal intelligence system that transforms how users work, communicate, and express themselves, all while protecting their privacy.
